The snow-covered walkway in front of the building serves as a safe and accessible path for pedestrians to enter and exit the building, especially during winter conditions when the walkway might otherwise be covered in snow or ice.

The clock tower on the building serves as a functional and decorative element, providing timekeeping and enhancing the aesthetic appeal of the structure.

The clock tower holds historical significance as it may have been a landmark or a symbol of the building's importance in the past, and it may also serve as a reminder of the building's history and heritage.
